column4: Hi everyone. I have installed the package 'playdeb', but when I click the 'install this now', in order to install a game, my system doesnt know which application should open to install it... I also have no idea where to find the 'playdeb' application (path). Someone help?    http://www.playdeb.net/updates/Ubuntu/all#how_to_install
What version of Ubuntu do you have installed?
Did you add the software soruce ?
YOu got it installed?  Yes?  Or are you still trying to install it?
my synaptic manager has the package 'playdeb' installed. I downloaded it from the website.
You did not install it via the package manager?
No, i didn't. The package says this:
This package adds the playdeb repository entry to your source list
and adds the respective GPG key.
I think so far, you've only added the source
i think you might be right. What should I do?
Oh, you probably need to do sudo apt-get update   first
And then, click on one of them.
